snippet.title: Picking a 2014 Masters winner and ranking the leaderboard on Sunday at Augusta
snippet.description:

snippet.description:

snippet.title: Meet the Bag Man: How to buy college football players, in the words of a man who delivers the money

snippet.title: Ranking the 2014 Masters rookies as the search for the next Tiger Woods intensifies
snippet.description:
Ranking the 2014 Masters rookies as the search for the next Tiger Woods intensifies by Brendan Porath on Apr 8 2014, 11:00a
The rookie crop is deep at this year's Masters, a potential transitional year with Tiger Woods absent for the first time.

snippet.title: How Ryan Perrilloux disappeared completely: On Signing Day in 2005, one of the top high school quarterbacks in America had it all. He's still trying to get it back.
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Close friends Jahlil Okafor and Jabari Parker aren't thinking about next year just yet
snippet.description:
Close friends Jahlil Okafor and Jabari Parker aren't thinking about next year just yet by Ricky O'Donnell on Feb 4 2014, 1:19p
Could Jabari Parker stick around Duke next season to play with his good friend Jahlil Okafor? Neither player is ready to think about that right now.

snippet.description:

snippet.title: No, college football players aren't unionizing for pay-for-play
snippet.description:
No, college football players aren't unionizing for pay-for-play by Jason Kirk on Jan 28 2014, 6:43p
Tuesday, college athletes at Northwestern University began an attempt to create a union. And if you actually listen to them, they're not calling for that thing you're disagreeing with them over.

snippet.title: Lexi Thompson leads LPGA youth movement with 2nd tour win
snippet.description:
Lexi Thompson leads LPGA youth movement with 2nd tour win by Emily Kay on Oct 14 2013, 12:41p
Lexi Thompson scores her second LPGA Tour win with a four-stroke victory in Malaysia.

snippet.title: This Week In Schadenfreude: West Virginia at rock bottom is a drunken possum
snippet.description:
